mapper.select: SELECT MNO FROM MEMBER WHERE MNICK=#{mnick}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TIMELINE VALUES (SEQ_TID.NEXTVAL, #{mNo}, DEFAULT, #{tContent}, DEFAULT, #{hashTag})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT M.PROFILE_PATH, M.MNICK, T.TDATE, T.TCONTENT, T.HASHTAG FROM MEMBER M JOIN TIMELINE T USING(MNO) ORDER BY T.TDATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM<=20 ORDER BY 3 ASC
